defaultValue.description: The initial value of `value` when uncontrolled

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is disabled

invalid.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is invalid

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the checkbox group

checkedChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.

checked.description: The checked state of the checkbox

defaultChecked.description:
The checked state of the checkbox when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the checkbox.

form.description: The id of the form that the checkbox belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the checkbox. Useful for composition.

name.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox.
Useful for form submission.

value.description: The value of checkbox input. Useful for form submission.
